sentence.Network_en: They kept phoning and writing, badgering me to go back.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们不停地给我打电话、写信，软磨硬泡要我回去。

sentence.Network_en: Tom has been badgering his uncle to buy him a camera.
sentence.Network_cn: 汤姆一直缠着他叔叔给他买照相机.

sentence.Network_en: My children kept badgering me to get a home computer.
sentence.Network_cn: 我的孩子纠缠不休地要我弄一架家用电脑.

entry.def: A badger is a wild animal which has a white head with two wide black stripes on it. Badgers live underground and usually come up to feed at night.
If you badger someone, you repeatedly tell them to do something or repeatedly ask them questions.

example.ex: She badgered her doctor time and again, pleading with him to do something...
example.tran: 她屡屡缠着她的医生不放，求他做点什么。

example.ex: They kept phoning and writing, badgering me to go back...
example.tran: 他们不停地给我打电话、写信，软磨硬泡要我回去。
